channel.title: Need Help With The Fishing Thing In ZdiddyScape V.3

item.title: Need Help With The Fishing Thing In ZdiddyScape V.3
item.dc:creator: @I_0ne_H1t_K0 I 0ne H1t K0
item.description:
@I_0ne_H1t_K0 wrote:

Mm When You Fish It Only Gives A Fish Etc It Looks Like This :

public void make(){ if (actionTimer == 0) { addItem(383,1); sendMessage("You catch a shark."); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[10]), 10); actionName = "make"; actionTimer = 10; pEmote = 0x306; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }

And I Edit It To Look Like

public void make(){ if (actionTimer == 0) { addItem(383,1); addItem(995, 10000); sendMessage("You catch a shark."); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[10]), 10); actionName = "make"; actionTimer = 10; pEmote = 0x306; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }

But Still Gives No Money >_<

Read full topic
